enchantment.reaping.executioner.desc: Add a chance to drop a players head when you reap them.
enchantment.reaping.curse_of_bluntness.d: Increases the chance that animals will die when they are reaped.
reaping.advancements.human_meat.title: Not so tasty...
reaping.advancements.human_meat.descript: You should have thought twice before eating that.
reaping.advancements.netherite_reaping_t: Seriously, sit down and ask yourself: 'Why did I do that?'
text.autoconfig.reaping.title: Reaping Mod Configuration
text.autoconfig.reaping.option.enableDis: Whether to allow reaping to be automated via dispensers.
text.autoconfig.reaping.option.reapPlaye: Whether to allow reaping players to make them small for a short amount of time.
